title: ServiceFabric.PubSubActors.Interfaces
description: Used by ServiceFabric.PubSubActors, which adds pub/sub behaviour to your Reliable Actors in Service Fabric. ServiceFabric.PubSubActors adds pub/sub behaviour to your Reliable Actors and Services in Service Fabric. How to use this package: https://github.com/loekd/ServiceFabric.PubSubActors/blob/master/README.md
summary: Main Package 'ServiceFabric.PubSubActors' lets 'Publishing' Actors & Services publish messages to 'Subscribing' Actors and Services, without the need to know anything about them.
